explanation: [0-0] In a room, a young man wearing a red Chicago Bulls hoodie is brushing his teeth with a toothbrush in his left hand, his hood up. To his right stands a young woman wearing a black hoodie, her hood also up. Behind them is a white wall and a yellow door.

[0-2] Next, the woman in the black hoodie pulls down the man's hood with a straight face, revealing his long curly hair. She then squats slightly and starts dancing, swaying her shoulders back and forth. The man, holding the toothbrush in his left hand, looks to the right in surprise.

[2-6] The scene then switches to the man wearing a black down jacket over his red hoodie, still with the hood up, walking forward. The woman in the black hoodie, her hood up, appears from the left side of the frame and pulls down the man's hood, revealing his long curly hair. The man nods slightly and looks forward in confusion as the woman dances away with her back to the camera. Behind the man is a white wall and door, with a potted green plant to the left.
